title: (x) Similar to Interstate?
content: I am looking for a typeface in Adobe Font Folio which is most like Interstate; suggestions?
author: Ina Saltz

comments.content:
Hi Ina,

I think the closest you can come in the Adobe Font Folio is Myriad Semi Condensed. A little further away is Frutiger.

A couple other thoughts could be Din Mittelschrift if you want to focus on the industrial road signage concept. I also have to suggest Trade Gothic because it's the only Font Folio sans-serif I like.
Thanks Jackson! I poked around, too, and came to the same conclusions, so thanks for the confirmation.

blue highway, it's a ttf that can't be embedded as live type in an indesign document but you can vector/rasterize it and drop it in wherever you wish.

In the spirit of unbridled creativity,

Troy Vera
